item.title: Trump’s budget bill and DOGE’s IRS staffing cuts could lead to a nightmare 2026 tax season, watchdog warns
item.description: The IRS lost one-quarter of its employees through staffing cuts, an independent watchdog reported Wednesday.

item.title: The UK is buying F-35 fighter jets capable of carrying nuclear weapons—but they’ll need Trump’s approval before dropping bombs
item.description: The United Kingdom will buy 12 U.S.-made F-35A fighter jets capable of carrying nuclear bombs.

item.title: Starbucks is changing how it charges for extra syrups, matcha powder
item.description: CEO Brian Niccol has been working to reverse a sales slump at Starbucks since he took the helm in September.

item.title: FedEx warns of pain ahead with tariffs weighing on demand
item.description: “We just simply cannot predict how that is going to play out,” FedEx Chief Customer Officer Brie Carere said.

item.title: Canva’s CTO encourages all 5,000 employees to find the AI tools that work best for them
item.description: Brendan Humphreys, the Chief Technology Officer at Canva, says all employees play a big role in figuring out what AI-enabled workplace tools are best ...
